All Classes and Interfaces

Classes
Class
Description
Appointment
Contains methods to create and modify appointment objects.
AppointmentFormController
Controller class for appointment form.
AppointmentsQuery
This abstract class provides methods to query, insert, update, and delete appointments from the database.
Contact
Contains methods to create and modify contact objects.
ContactsQuery
This abstract class provides methods to query contacts from the database.
Customer
Contains methods to create and modify customer objects.
CustomerFormController
Controller class for the customer form.
CustomersQuery
This abstract class provides methods to query, insert, update, and delete customers from the database.
DateTimeUtil
Utility class for date and time conversions and manipulations.
Division
Contains a mapping between divisions and their associated countries.
DivisionsQuery
This abstract class provides methods to query data related to divisions from the database.
JDBC
 
LogInController
Controller class for login form.
Main
 
MainFormAction
Contains methods that handle actions and operations related to the main form.
MainFormController
Controller class for the main form.
Reports
Provides classes and methods for generating reports.
Reports.MonthTypeReportData
Data structure for the tally by month and type report.
Reports.TypeAvgLengthReportData
Data structure for the average length by type report.
Roster
Contains the rosters of customers, contacts, and users.
Schedule
Contains the schedule of appointments.
User
Contains methods to create and modify user objects.
UsersQuery
This abstract class provides methods to query data related to users from the database.
